p: The main compounds in GA were endo-Borneol (185 g kg −1), 3-Cyclohexen-1-o1 (102 g kg −1), and Pentan-1,3-Dioldiisobutyrate (511 g kg −1), while IN contained Camphor (332 g kg −1) and 1-Borneol (299 g kg −1) ( Table 2). The SA mainly contained trans-Caryophyllene (162 g kg −1), δ-Cadinene (109 g kg −1), α-Cadinol (131 g kg −1), and T-Muurolol (151 g kg −1).
